Ground source heat pump.Description: Ground source heat pumps utilize geothermal energy as a renewable energy source for heating and cooling purposes.
Ground source heat pumps rely on heat transfer principles to extract and transfer heat between the ground and the building.
Ground source heat pumps use a ground loop system to circulate a heat transfer fluid through the ground to extract or dissipate heat.
Ground source heat pump is a type of heat pump that utilizes the ground as a heat source or sink for heating and cooling.
